description.brazilian: Sua jornada como estalajadeiro começa: a primeira caneca foi servida!
description.english: Your innkeeper’s journey begins: the first mug is served!
description.french: Votre aventure d’aubergiste commence : la première chope est servie !
description.german: Deine Reise als Wirt beginnt: der erste Krug ist serviert!
description.italian: Il tuo viaggio da oste inizia: il primo boccale è servito!
description.polish: Twoja droga karczmarza zaczyna się: pierwszy kufel został podany!
description.russian: Ваш путь трактирщика начался: первая кружка ушла в добрые руки!
description.spanish: Tu camino como tabernero comienza: ¡la primera jarra está servida!
description.turkish: Meyhaneci yolculuğun başlıyor: ilk kupa servis edildi!

description.brazilian: Um hóspede pega a cama e você já está contando moedas.
description.english: A guest takes the bed, and you’re already counting coins.
description.french: Un client prend son lit, et vous comptez déjà les pièces.
description.german: Ein Gast liegt im Bett, und du zählst schon die Münzen.
description.italian: Un ospite prende il letto e tu conti già le monete.
description.polish: Gość kładzie się do łóżka, a ty już liczysz monety.
description.russian: Гость улёгся на постель, а вы уже считаете монетки.
description.spanish: Un huésped toma la cama y tú ya cuentas las monedas.
description.turkish: Bir misafir yatağa uzandı, sen ise şimdiden paraları sayıyorsun.

description.brazilian: Vinte canecas depois, você já entende de bebidas.
description.english: Twenty mugs later, you’re starting to know your drinks.
description.french: Vingt chopes plus tard, vous commencez à bien connaître vos boissons.
description.german: Zwanzig Krüge später kennst du dich schon mit Getränken aus.
description.italian: Dopo venti boccali, inizi a conoscere bene le bevande.
description.polish: Dwadzieścia kufli później znasz się już na trunkach.
description.russian: Двадцать кружек, и вы уже знаете толк в напитках.
description.spanish: Tras veinte jarras, empiezas a conocer bien las bebidas.
description.turkish: Yirmi kupadan sonra içkileri iyi tanımaya başladın.

description.brazilian: Trinta pratos servidos — a cozinha ferve de vida!
description.english: Thirty dishes served — the kitchen is boiling with life!
description.french: Trente plats servis — la cuisine est en pleine effervescence !
description.german: Dreißig Gerichte serviert — die Küche brodelt vor Leben!
description.italian: Trenta piatti serviti — la cucina ribolle di vita!
description.polish: Trzydzieści dań podanych — kuchnia aż kipi życiem!
description.russian: Тридцать блюд поданы — кухня кипит во всю!
description.spanish: Treinta platos servidos — ¡la cocina hierve de vida!
description.turkish: Oturuz tabak servis edildi — mutfak hayatla kaynıyor!

description.english: Twenty guests have found a roof over their heads.
description.french: Vingt clients ont trouvé un toit.
description.german: Zwanzig Gäste haben ein Dach über dem Kopf gefunden.
description.italian: Venti ospiti hanno trovato un tetto sopra la testa.
description.polish: Dwudziestu gości znalazło dach nad głową.
description.russian: Двадцать гостей обрели крышу над головой.
description.spanish: Veinte huéspedes han encontrado un techo.
description.turkish: Yirmi misafir başlarını sokacak bir çatı buldu.

description.brazilian: Seu tesouro tilinta com 7.777 moedas de ouro!
description.french: Votre trésor tinte avec 7 777 pièces d’or !
description.italian: Il tuo forziere tintinna con 7.777 monete d’oro!
description.spanish: ¡Tu tesoro tintinea con 7.777 monedas de oro!

description.brazilian: Suprimentos reabastecidos: dez entregas de barco concluídas.
description.english: Supplies restocked: ten boat deliveries completed.
description.french: Réserves remplies : dix livraisons par bateau terminées.
description.italian: Scorte rinnovate: dieci consegne in barca completate.
description.polish: Zapasy uzupełnione: dziesięć dostaw łodzią zakończonych.
description.russian: Запасы пополнены: десять заказов доставлены лодкой.
description.spanish: Provisiones repuestas: diez entregas en barco completadas.
description.turkish: Erzak yenilendi: on tekne teslimatı tamamlandı.

description.brazilian: Todas as melhorias concluídas: sua taverna brilha em glória.
description.english: All upgrades complete: your tavern shines in glory.
description.french: Toutes les améliorations complétées : votre taverne brille de gloire.
description.german: Alle Verbesserungen abgeschlossen: deine Taverne glänzt im Ruhm.
description.italian: Tutti i miglioramenti completati: la tua taverna brilla di gloria.
description.polish: Wszystkie ulepszenia ukończone: twoja karczma lśni chwałą.
description.russian: Все улучшения завершены: ваша таверна сияет во всей красе.
description.spanish: Todas las mejoras completadas: tu taberna brilla en gloria.
description.turkish: Tüm geliştirmeler tamamlandı: meyhanen görkemle parlıyor.

description.brazilian: Você superou todos os desafios e restaurou a glória da sua taverna.
description.english: You’ve conquered every challenge and restored your tavern’s glory.
description.french: Vous avez relevé tous les défis et rendu sa gloire à la taverne.
description.german: Du hast jede Herausforderung gemeistert und den Ruhm deiner Taverne zurückgebracht.
description.italian: Hai superato ogni sfida e restituito gloria alla taverna.
description.polish: Pokonałeś wszystkie wyzwania i przywróciłeś chwale karczmy.
description.russian: Вы справились со всеми испытаниями и вернули славу таверне.
description.spanish: Has superado todos los desafíos y devuelto la gloria a la taberna.
description.turkish: Tüm zorlukların üstesinden geldin ve meyhanene görkemini geri kazandırdın.

description.italian: Decorazione perfezionata — raggiunta la vera accoglienza!
description.russian: Декор доведён до совершенства — настоящий уют!

description.brazilian: Ouvidos felizes, pés batendo no ritmo.
description.french: Oreilles ravies, pieds qui battent la mesure.
description.italian: Orecchie felici, piedi che battono il ritmo.
description.spanish: Oídos felices, pies que marcan el ritmo.

description.brazilian: Você ouviu seu primeiro boato de um cliente. O que escondem os vizinhos..?
description.english: Heard your first rumor from a guest. What are the neighbors hiding..?
description.french: Vous avez entendu votre première rumeur d’un client. Que cachent les voisins..?
description.german: Du hast dein erstes Gerücht von einem Gast gehört. Was verbergen die Nachbarn..?
description.italian: Hai sentito la tua prima voce da un ospite. Cosa nascondono i vicini..?
description.polish: Usłyszałeś swoją pierwszą plotkę od gościa. Co kryją sąsiedzi..?
description.russian: Услышали первый слух от клиента. Что же скрывают соседи?...
description.spanish: Has escuchado tu primer rumor de un cliente. ¿Qué esconden los vecinos..?
description.turkish: Bir misafirden ilk dedikodunu duydun. Komşular ne saklıyor..?
